# User Guide for One-Click SEO Links Chrome Extension

## Overview
One-Click SEO Links is a Chrome extension designed for web developers and SEO professionals. It offers two modes - Manual and AI - to fill out forms on navigation websites, allowing users to quickly and efficiently submit SEO links. The Manual Mode utilizes user-defined configurations, while the AI Mode leverages advanced AI technology to automate the process. This tool streamlines the process of promoting backlinks, enabling more effective SEO strategies.

## Why Use One-Click SEO Links?
The One-Click SEO Links extension offers several benefits that make it essential for anyone involved in SEO:
- Dual Modes: Provides both Manual and AI modes to cater to different user preferences and requirements.
- Efficiency: Automates the tedious process of manually filling out forms, saving users valuable time and effort.
- Customizable Configurations: Allows users to create and manage website-specific configurations for easy form filling in Manual Mode.
- AI-Powered Automation: Utilizes AI technology to intelligently recognize and fill form fields based on user-defined settings in AI Mode.
- Support for Multiple Submissions: Enables users to submit multiple SEO link requests for one navigation site in a single session using AI Mode, optimizing workflow and project management.
- Privacy and Security: Stores all data locally for Manual Mode, ensuring no network requests are made and user data remains secure.

## Usage Instructions
### Manual Mode
1. Access Options Page: Click on the extension icon to open the options page, where you can configure settings.
2. Website Configurations: Enter details for any websites you want to target, including the name and relevant fields like Title, URL, Tags, etc.
3. Switch to Manual Mode: Click the "AI" button to switch to Manual Mode.
4. Select Website Configuration: Choose the desired website configuration from the available options.
5. Fill Form Fields: Click on form fields to open a drop-down menu displaying all the information from your selected website configuration. Click on an option to fill the corresponding field.
6. Submit Form: Manually submit the form after filling all the required fields.

### AI Mode
1. Access Options Page: Click on the extension icon to open the options page, where you can configure settings.
2. AI Model Configuration: Select your preferred AI model (e.g., Gemini, DeepSeek, GPT-4, or GPT-3.5 or any model support openai api) and enter the corresponding API key to allow the extension to authenticate with the AI services.
3. Submission Type: Choose between single or multiple submissions:
   - Single Submission: AI will recognize and automatically fill a single website's information without submitting the form.
   - Multiple Submissions: AI will assist you in automatically submitting multiple times using the selected website configurations.
4. Using AI Mode: When on a website with a compatible form, click the extension icon, select your desired AI configuration and submission type, and click the "Autofill Form" button to initiate the AI-powered form-filling process.

## Privacy and Security
In Manual Mode, all data is stored locally within the extension, ensuring that no network requests are made and your data remains secure. AI Mode requires an internet connection and the use of third-party AI services, which may have their own privacy policies. Please review the privacy policies of the AI services you choose to use.

## Conclusion
The One-Click SEO Links Chrome extension offers a versatile solution for developers and marketers looking to streamline their SEO link submission process. With the option to choose between Manual and AI modes, users can tailor the extension to their specific needs and preferences. Manual Mode provides a secure and customizable way to fill forms using pre-defined configurations, while AI Mode harnesses the power of artificial intelligence to automate the process and support multiple submissions. Whether you prefer a hands-on approach or the convenience of AI-powered automation, One-Click SEO Links has you covered, making it an indispensable tool for efficient and effective SEO management.
